name: Ridiculous Rush
description:
Some challenges are much harder to beat than they may seem at the first glance. Take your chances and accept the ultimate parkour challenge!

Ridiculous Rush is a 2D platformer game with a big variety of levels. You control a character trying to find the way to a portal to the next level, avoiding multiple obstacles. Each level has increasing level of difficulty. Some levels have multiple ways of completing. Try your best and find them all!

Game features:
- Difficulty
- Simple controls
- Multiple Levels
